name: Vegas Casino Slots - Mega Win
description:
The most popular slot machine game in 2018! Spin in real Vegas Casino and Win Big with more than 20 slot machines. Lots of bonus and jackpots, just enjoy!

Now you can play real Vegas casino slots on your phone instead of going to Vegas. Whenever and wherever FREE! What you need to do is just a single tap to download and spin! Then you can enjoy the excitement and win the jackpot.

When you first login to Vegas Casino Slots, you could get 2,000,000 welcome bonuses. It helps you to play in your favorite slot machine and win big. Slot machines such as BUFFAlO BATTLE, RHINO RUSH, TROVE OF PEARL, PANDA, PAPER CUTTING, PRINCESS OF JAGUAR, BEER CARNIVAL, WOLF MOON, DESERT TREASURE, WILD GREEN, SEASGAPE DIVING, MORE CHILI, PLAME TO HEAVEN, MYSTERY OF MAYA are waiting for you!

Game Features
2,000,000 Free coins as welcome bonus for you.
Grand jackpot in every slot machine waiting for you to win!
Free coins in every 1 hour and each time level up!
High payout with lots of feature games such as FREE SPIN, HOLD & SPIN, RESPIN, BONUS GAMES.
All machines unlocked. Just choose your favorite one.
Connect to Facebook to collect 500,000 free coins.
Spin the wheel of fortune every day to get bonus.

This product is intended for use by those 21 or older for amusement purposes only. Practice or success at social casino gaming does not imply future success at real money gambling. The games do not offer "real money gambling" or an opportunity to win real money or prizes.
